Morning Bid: China data underwhelms, adds to risk-off moodA look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee Wed, 17 Jan 2024 05:34:18 GMT ZMXH3HB65BLIHOLT3YTAARRBKU https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/global-markets-view-europe-2024-01-17/Reuters市场欧洲市场
Breakingviews: China consumers keep Beijing, and world, on edgeAll eyes will be on China’s consumers in 2024. The economy expanded 5.2% year-on-year in the fourth quarter, thanks to manufacturing. But maintaining the momentum will be tricky as local demand remains weak. Factories are starting to look abroad to cope with overcapacity, which will stoke global trade tensions. How Beijing spurs domestic consumption will be vital. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 04:36:32 GMT V2OORHK6WNKQROUSLKUOTZIIXY https://www.reuters.com/breakingviews/china-consumers-keep-beijing-world-edge-2024-01-17/Chan Ka Sing突破性观点
China says threats of force over Taiwan not aimed at most TaiwaneseChina's position that it will not renounce using force to bring Taiwan under its control is aimed at foreign interference and a tiny number of separatists, but Taiwanese need to be disabused of "biases" against China, the government said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 04:22:51 GMT GHTWF4TP5FMBDCDEXPP3SZYKHI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-threats-force-over-taiwan-not-aimed-most-taiwanese-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
China helps Pacific Islands with policing, not defence - ambassadorChina has a strategy to help Pacific Island nations with policing, not defence, and its growing presence in the region should not alarm Australia, China's ambassador to Australia said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 04:03:19 GMT 7DDJ7HCVQBNGVAFHIDU2KWPU3A https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-helps-pacific-islands-with-policing-not-defence-ambassador-2024-01-17/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
China's Cyberspace Administration is conducting review of Shein -WSJThe Cyberspace Administration of China is conducting a cybersecurity review of online retailer Shein's data handling and sharing practices, the Wall Street Journal reported. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 03:48:21 GMT 2GPI6Z7F5NKBVM6BHSOTRIQHPI https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/chinas-cyberspace-administration-is-conducting-review-shein-wsj-2024-01-17/Reuters技术网络安全
Oil falls as China's economic recovery disappoints, dollar strengthensOil fell on Wednesday as economic growth in China, the world's second-largest crude user, slightly missed expectations, raising concerns about future demand increases while U.S. dollar strength dented investor's risk appetite. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 02:27:29 GMT ABZRV3JDF5MRTPYD7B6HZIECXY https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/oil-prices-fall-stronger-dollar-offsets-red-sea-disruptions-risks-2024-01-17/Muyu Xu, Colleen Howe商业活力
China's Q4 GDP shows patchy economic recovery, raises case for stimulusChina's economy grew slightly slower than expected in the fourth quarter, with a deepening property crisis, mounting deflationary pressures and weak demand reinforcing expectations that Beijing will have to roll out more stimulus measures soon. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 02:09:20 GMT C2X7QYM4GBMRRHQTSIBKOU7POI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-q4-gdp-grows-52-yy-below-market-forecast-2024-01-17/Kevin Yao, Ellen Zhang世界中国
Asia stocks slide as China weakness, rate cut jitters weighAsian equities slumped on Wednesday, led by Chinese stocks after a slew of data pointed to a patchy recovery in the world's second-biggest economy, while the dollar was near a one-month high as traders dialled back bets of early interest rate cuts. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 02:06:46 GMT 6JXXCYWQYNPW5EJX2GEZSJ7O3E https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-17/Ankur Banerjee市场
China's population drops for 2nd year, with record low birth rateChina's population fell for a second consecutive year in 2023, as a record low birth rate and a wave of COVID-19 deaths when strict lockdowns ended accelerated a downturn that will have profound long-term effects on the economy's growth potential. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 02:04:41 GMT TVFZSLJ2A5NH5NULVBHYWYPMGY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-population-drops-2nd-year-raises-long-term-growth-concerns-2024-01-17/Farah Master世界中国
China's property market slide worsens despite government supportChina's troubled property market ended last year with the worst declines in new home prices in nearly nine years, despite government efforts to prop up the sector that was once a key driver of the world's second largest economy. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 01:41:45 GMT JCEBHBKJ65MT3KA7WTDXCN65T4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-dec-new-home-prices-fall-fastest-pace-since-feb-2015-2024-01-17/Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo市场宏观问题
China to support Togo in safeguarding its sovereignty, security -Wang YiChina will continue to firmly support Togo in safeguarding its sovereignty, security and development interests, China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said while visiting the African country, according to a ministry statement on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 01:16:16 GMT E6ZVQWPZ6FLF7OQSWZX776U7G4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-support-togo-safeguarding-its-sovereignty-security-wang-yi-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
